ticket_summary: Customer is requesting compensation for a delay experienced on Flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024.
email_subject: Request for Compensation – Flight AL1013 Delay on July 19, 2024
email_body:
Dear Customer Service,

I am writing to formally request compensation for the significant delay I experienced on Flight AL1013 on July 19, 2024. This delay caused considerable inconvenience and disrupted my travel plans.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Arvind Vivekanandan
